get.description: Returns a list of all sessions in a specific namespace

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace to list sessions from

post.description: Creates a new session in a given namespace

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace this session should be created in.  This namespace will be created if it does not exist.

requestBody.description: Graph of agents to be used in the session

403.description: Invalid application ID or privacy key

400.description: The agent graph is invalid and could not be processed

get.summary: Get all sessions from all namespaces
get.description: Returns a list of namespaces containing their respective sessions
Returns the current state of a session, the agents, threads and their messages

404.description: If either namespace or session ID is invalid

delete.description: Closes an active session, cancelling all running agents

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the session to close

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The sessionId of the session to close

404.description: If either namespace or session ID is invalid

get.description: Returns a list of all agents available in this servers registry
Returns all details about a specific agent in the local registry
Returns all details about a specific agent in the marketplace
Returns all details about a specific agent from a specific linked server

parameters.name: linkedServerName
parameters.description: The name of the linked server to source the details of this agent from

404.description: Agent or linked server not found

post.description: Requests a certain amount of money to be paid for a work done by a rental agent

requestBody.description: A description of the work done and the payment required

400.description: No payment associated with the session

post.description: Allows an agent to request that the server pays for an x402 service by proxy

post.summary: Reserve a list of rental agents
post.description: Reserves a list of rental agents

requestBody.description: A list of agents to claim

400.description: GraphAgentRequest is invalid in a remote context

get.summary: Get wallet address for rental agents
get.description: Returns the wallet address payments should be made to for renting agents from this server

403.description: This server is not configured to allow rental agents

get.description: Returns a list of all agents available to rent from this server

GraphAgentRequest.description: A request for an agent.  GraphAgentRequest -> GraphAgent

id.description: The ID of this agent in the registry

name.description: A given name for this agent in the session/group
name.title: String

description.description: An optional override for the description of this agent
description.title: String

options.description: The arguments to pass to the agent
options.title: LinkedHashMap<String,AgentOptionValue>

systemPrompt.description: The system prompt/developer text/preamble passed to the agent
systemPrompt.title: String

blocking.description: All blocking agents in a group must be instantiated before the group can communicate.  Non-blocking agents' contributions to groups are optional
blocking.title: Boolean

customToolAccess.description: A list of custom tools that this agent can access.  The custom tools must be defined in the parent AgentGraphRequest object
customToolAccess.title: LinkedHashSet<String>

plugins.description: Plugins that should be installed on this agent.  See GraphAgentPlugin for more information
plugins.title: LinkedHashSet<GraphAgentPlugin>

anyOf.description: The agent will be provided by a linked server
anyOf.title: linked

anyOf.description: The agent will be provided by this server
anyOf.title: local

anyOf.description: A remote agent provided by a specific server

server.description: The server that is providing this remote agent

runtime.description: The runtime to be used on the remote server.  Likely Docker or Phala

wallet.description: The wallet address of the server that is providing this remote agent
wallet.title: String

maxCost.description: The max cost of this agent
maxCost.title: AgentClaimAmount

paymentSessionId.description: The payment session ID for this remote agent.  This will be shared with all other remote agents in the graph
paymentSessionId.title: String

anyOf.title: remote

anyOf.description: A request for a remote agent and a list of places to try and source a server from

runtime.description: The runtime that should be used for this remote agent.  Servers can export only specific runtimes so the runtime choice may narrow servers that can adequately provide the agent

maxCost.description: The maximum we are willing to pay for this remote agent, note that if this is not high enough there may be no remotes willing to provide the agent
maxCost.title: AgentClaimAmount

serverSource.description: A description of which servers should be queried for this remote agent request
serverSource.title: GraphAgentServerSource

anyOf.description: Custom server scoring.  Weights can be added on a flat or multiplier basis per attribute
The effect will be applied for every attribute of the specified type with a boolean false value

effect.description: A flat negative or positive weight

anyOf.title: is_false

anyOf.description: The effect will be applied if the no attribute of the specified type is present

effect.description: A flat negative or positive weight

anyOf.title: is_not_present

anyOf.description: The effect will be applied for every attribute of the specified type
anyOf.title: is_present

anyOf.description: The effect will be applied for every attribute of the specified type with a boolean true value

effect.description: A flat negative or positive weight

anyOf.title: is_true

anyOf.description: The effect will be applied for every attribute of the specified type with a matching string value

effect.description: A flat negative or positive weight

anyOf.title: string_equal

anyOf.description: The effect will be applied for every attribute of the specified type with a non-matching string value

effect.description: A flat negative or positive weight

anyOf.title: string_not_equal
custom

anyOf.description: Default server scoring.  No weights assigned to any server attribute
anyOf.title: default

serverScoring.description: Customisation for the scoring of servers
serverScoring.title: GraphAgentServerScoring

anyOf.title: remote_request

provider.description: The server that should provide this agent and the runtime to use
provider.title: GraphAgentProvider

x402Budgets.description: An optional list of resources and an accompanied budget that this agent may spend on services that accept x402 payments
x402Budgets.title: ArrayList<X402BudgetedResource>

GraphAgentRequest.title: GraphAgentRequest

name.description: The exact name of the agent in the registry
name.title: String

version.description: The exact version of the agent in the registry
version.title: String

registrySourceId.description: The identifier for the registry source that contains this agent
registrySourceId.title: AgentRegistrySourceIdentifier

flat.description: A flat negative or positive weight
flat.title: flat

anyOf.description: A flat negative or positive weight
anyOf.title: flat

anyOf.description: A multiplier weight, this effect will only multiply against attributes with a number type
anyOf.title: multiplier

X402BudgetedResource.description: A budget given to an agent for a specific resource

priority.description: The priority of this budget.  If a x402 service accepts multiple resources and an agent was given a budget for multiple resources, the resource with the highest priority will be used until it is consumed
priority.title: Int

remainingBudget.description: The remaining budget for this resource in atomic units
remainingBudget.title: ULong

X402BudgetedResource.title: X402BudgetedResource

agents.description: Every agent required for this agent graph
agents.title: ArrayList<GraphAgentRequest>

groups.description: A set, containing sets that define the agent groups by name
groups.title: LinkedHashSet<LinkedHashSet<String>>

customTools.description: A map of custom tools to provide to the agents in this graph
customTools.title: LinkedHashMap<String,CustomTool>

namespace.description: The namespace that this session belongs in
namespace.title: String

sessionId.description: The unique identifier for the session
sessionId.title: String

SessionAgentState.description: The state of an agent running in a session

name.description: The name given for this agent in the AgentGraph, this is unique in the graph
name.title: String

registryAgentIdentifier.description: The identifier for this agent's registry entry.  See RegistryAgent for more information

isWaiting.description: True when the agent is waiting for a message from another agent
isWaiting.title: Boolean

isConnected.description: True after agent process was launched and made a connection to the Coral MCP server.  The agent will not be responsive until connected
isConnected.title: Boolean

description.description: The description of this agent, given to other agents in the graph
description.title: String

links.description: A list of agents that this agent is aware of, constructed from agent groups in the AgentGraph
links.title: LinkedHashSet<String>

SessionAgentState.title: SessionAgentState

SessionState.description: The state of a running session

id.description: The unique identifier for this session
id.title: String

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when this state was generated
timestamp.title: Long

namespace.description: The namespace that this session resides in
namespace.title: String

agents.description: A list of the states of all agents in this session
agents.title: ArrayList<SessionAgentState>

threads.description: A list of the states of all threads in this session
threads.title: ArrayList<SessionThread>

SessionState.title: SessionState

RegistryAgentCatalog.description: A catalog describing an agent and it's available versions

versions.description: All versions this agent is available in
versions.title: ArrayList<String>

RegistryAgentCatalog.title: RegistryAgentCatalog

anyOf.description: This agent can only be run on remote servers
anyOf.title: remote

amount.description: The amount to claim.  This will be converted to Coral when received
amount.title: AgentClaimAmount

AgentRemainingBudget.description:
This object is returned by the agent claim endpoint and represents the remaining budget for the agent.  The agent 
    should use this respond to decide whether whether it can continue providing services with the remaining budget.
    
    This object attaches a USD price for a Coral to it so that agents do not have to make multiple calls to the pricing 
    endpoint to determine the price of a Coral.  This field is an 'estimate', it can be based off cached data and may not 
    be accurate, so this should only be used if the agent represented it's rates in USD.
    
    If better accuracy is required agent-side, the budget should only use micro-corals.

remainingBudget.description: The remaining budget for the agent, represented in micro-corals
remainingBudget.title: Long

coralUsdPrice.description: Current USD price for one whole Coral
coralUsdPrice.title: Double

AgentRemainingBudget.title: AgentRemainingBudget

X402ProxyRequest.description: A proxied request to a service that potentially requests x402 payment

endpoint.description: The full endpoint of the target API
endpoint.title: String

method.description: The API method, e.g. POST, GET, DELETE, etc
method.title: String

X402ProxyRequest.title: X402ProxyRequest
